turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu rahatsız edici durumu hissetmemişsen, tepkin farklı olurdu.
english_example_sentence: If you had not felt this uncomfortable situation, your reaction would have been different.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не почувствовал эту неловкую ситуацию, твоя реакция была бы другой.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu rahatsız edici durumu ______, tepkin farklı olurdu.
